author: USA TODAY, Bob Nightengale, USA TODAY
title: MLB employees to be subjects of country's largest COVID-19 antibody study
description: The nationwide study that will test about 10,000 people for coronavirus antibodies will enable researchers to understand how widespread COVID-19 is.
content:
USA TODAY Sports' Bob Nightengale reflects on the life of Yankees' Hank Steinbrenner.
USA TODAY
